review.title: “Sales”
review.pros: Pros – nice place to work, nice people, good times, decent hours, good environment in a nice building with thoughtful people. OK
review.cons: Cons – can be long hours, but overall a good place. technical site getting better, tools are good and getting better now.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – keep doing what you are doing and offering people a good place to work - you guys are fun and fair to work for.
